import React from 'react' function Confirm() { const todayMonth = (new Date().getMonth()) //get current month const todayMthStr = todayMonth.toString() console.log(todayMthStr) const todayDay = new Date().getDate(); //get current day const todayYear = new Date().getFullYear(); //get current year return ( <>

Purchase Confirmed!

Your Order is Set To Arrive 3 days from:

{todayMonth} {todayDay}, {todayYear}

) } export default Confirm
